name: Bloxy the Fighting Square: Test/Prototype
description:
A game about a fighting block. As the first game in the series, Bloxy has to defeat evil triangles that are attempting to take over Shape Town! Will the town be saved? That's up to you!

Current music from Kirby Star Allies and Super Mario Oddesy. (Will be replaced with original soundtracks soon)

All art and coding done by me, BloxyFromScratch !
